attributes.action: Hide speed cameras from view - and increase their number
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Putting speed cameras in full view and painting them in highly visible colours just encourages drivers to slow down in their vicinity. Hiding them would mean that drivers would not know their whereabouts and would therefore be more inclined to observe the speed limits wherever they drive. Law-abiding drivers have nothing to fear - those who object are admitting to being law-breakers or potential law-breakers.
